name: Hotline (IceHeart)
description:
A short game developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
Your task is simple: connect people all around the world by wireing their sockets together.
The Problem is: There are a lot of people trying to communicate.
Don't mess this up, or you'll get fired!

>> Esc to open the pause menu

Disclaimer

The Music is really awful, since i have no experience at composing, so fell free to mute it.

Feel free to leave Feedback, so I can improve myself
